Package com.atakmap.android.widgets

Class FahArrowWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.platform.binding.AbstractPropertyBindingObject<IMapWidget>
      • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget
        • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget2
          • com.atakmap.android.widgets.ShapeWidget
            • com.atakmap.android.widgets.FahArrowWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, IPropertyBindingObject<IMapWidget>, IMapWidget, IShapeWidget
    public class FahArrowWidget
extends ShapeWidget
implements android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener
    A MapWidget class that will display an arrow representing the Final Attack Heading towards a targeted IP and with an offset from some designator point. The widget will also display a cone that represents the offset width from the heading on each side. The final attack heading text value will be displayed above the heading arrow, as well as the text heading values of the cone's sides.
